item.title: Siddhartha
item.description: 看外在 很久以来，我一直在思考隐藏在事物背后的含义。当听到一首音乐，我会想这首音乐在诉说什么故事，而忽略其本身的婉转动听；当看到一束美丽的鲜花

item.title: Serendipity
item.description: 犯规 我醒来的时候 你静静地躺在那 经过一夜的奔波 你却依旧美丽 Serendipity When I awake from asleep There lies you, silently Though a busy night has gone Still beautiful you are.

item.title: Dynamic Programming Problems
item.description: max sum of consecutive number in an array [5, -1, 3, -5, 2] => 5+-1+3=7 O(n) dp, O(n log n) divide and conquer Longest common substring in two string “abcdef” “ade” => “de” O(n^2) dp Longest common subsequence in two string “abcdef” “ade” => “ade” O(n^2) dp

item.title: Summary of 2021
item.description: 2021 总结 最佳游戏 开车 P4G 今年在游戏上是失败的一年，没有玩过什么好游戏。最好玩的是开车，其次是Persona 4 Golden，但还没通关，也没什么通

item.title: On Death
item.description: On Death by John Keats Can death be sleep, when life is but a dream. And scenes of bliss pass as a phantom by? The transient pleasures as a vision seem, And yet we think the greatest pain’s to die.

item.title: Different program use different net link under Linux
item.description:
Why

Sometimes, you may want your program use one specific net device, because your net devices have different network access abilities.

item.title: Nginx rewrite: last, break or default
item.description:
前言

最近了解了一些nginx的知识，上网查看了一些资料，特此做一些分享。

item.title: Everything you need to know about index in MySQL
item.description:
前言

索引是由存储引擎实现的一种快速查找数据的结构，不同存储引擎对索引的实现和支持不同。其不仅能影响到select语句，也能影响到insert语句和drop语句。不仅能影响到查询的where部分，也能影响到select部分，group by部分以及order by部分.

item.title: About
item.description: About me Who Poet Programmer From Suzhou, China Computer ChromeBook Editor Vim Visual Studio Code About this blog Purpose Writing down my feeling about this world. Writing down some technic i would like to share. Writing down some experience. When i start 2018-06-20
